DOC.brief_summary: The objective study demonstrate bioequivalence Test Product ( A ) : Tacrolimus Capsules 1 mg , manufacture Panacea Biotec Limited , India correspond Reference Product ( B ) : Prograf ( Tacrolimus ) Capsules 1 mg , manufacture Astellas Pharma , Inc. , USA 36 normal , healthy , adult , male subject feed condition .
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study Tacrolimus 1 mg Capsule Under Fed Condition
DOC.detailed_description: Total 36 normal healthy adult male subject enrol study . Subjects administer either Test Reference Product 240 mL water period per randomization schedule . Subjects fast least 10 hour prior High Fat Breakfast half hour administration study drug four ( 4 ) additional hour , post dose study period . Standardized meal provide study period . Water accessible subject 1 hour Predose 2 hour Post dose period . A total 26 blood sample withdraw pharmacokinetic profiling . The whole blood concentration Tacrolimus measure validated LC/MS/MS analytical method . Ratio analysis perform untransformed log transform pharmacokinetic parameter Cmax , AUC0-72 , AUC0 inf . ANOVA perform log transform pharmacokinetic parameter Cmax , AUC0-72 , AUC0-inf 90 % confidence interval construct ratio geometric least square mean Test Reference product , obtain log-transformed data . Bioequivalence conclude ratio estimate well 90 % confidence interval , fall within acceptable range 80.00 % 125.00 % Cmax , AUC0-72 AUC0-inf .

Willingness follow protocol requirement evidence write , informed consent . 6 . Agreeing , use medication prescription counter medication include vitamin mineral 14 day prior study & course study . 7 . No history presence significant alcoholism drug abuse past one year . 8 . Nonsmokers , ex smoker moderate smoker include . `` Moderate smoker define someone smoking 10 cigarette less per day , ex smoker someone completely stop smoke least 3 month . '' 1 . Requiring medication ailment include enzymemodifying drug previous 28 day , day 1 dosing . 2 . Any medical surgical condition , might significantly interfere function gastrointestinal tract , bloodforming organ etc . 3 . History presence cardiovascular , renal , hepatic , ophthalmic , pulmonary , neurological , metabolic , haematological , gastrointestinal , endocrine , immunological psychiatric disease . 4 . Participation clinical drug study bioequivalence study 90 day prior present study . 5 . History presence malignancy serious disease . 6 . Refusal abstain food least ten ( 10 ) hour prior administration study drug four ( 4 ) additional hour , post dose study period . 7 . Any contraindication blood sampling . 8 . Refusal abstain water least one ( 1 ) hour prior study drug administration dose day study period least two ( 2 ) additional hour , post dosing except 240 mL administer administration dose . 9 . Use xanthinecontaining beverage food grapefruit grapefruit product 48 hour prior drug dose . 10 . Blood donation 90 day prior commencement study . 11 .
